parts.text: {"word":"encostar","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(物を)立てかける、寄りかからせる、もたせかける","english_definition":"to lean (something) against, to prop up, to rest against","examples":[{"sentence":"Encostei a bicicleta na parede.","translation":"I leaned the bicycle against the wall.","english_translation":"I leaned the bike against the wall."},{"sentence":"Ele encostou a escada na árvore.","translation":"He leaned the ladder against the tree.","english_translation":"He leaned the ladder against the tree."}],"collocations":["encostar a bicicleta (lean the bicycle)","encostar a escada (lean the ladder)","encostar na parede (lean against the wall)"],"synonyms":["apoiar","escorar","arrimar"],"antonyms":["desencostar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(人が)寄りかかる、もたれる、休憩する","english_definition":"to lean, to rest, to recline","examples":[{"sentence":"Ela encostou na cadeira para descansar.","translation":"She leaned back in the chair to rest.","english_translation":"She leaned back in the chair to rest."},{"sentence":"Ele encostou na parede enquanto esperava.","translation":"He leaned against the wall while waiting.","english_translation":"He leaned against the wall while waiting."}],"collocations":["encostar na parede (lean against the wall)","encostar na cadeira (lean on the chair)","encostar para descansar (lean to rest)"],"synonyms":["apoiar-se","recostar-se","repousar"],"antonyms":["desencostar-se"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(車などを)寄せる、路肩に止める","english_definition":"to pull over (a vehicle), to park on the side of the road","examples":[{"sentence":"O policial mandou o carro encostar.","translation":"The police officer ordered the car to pull over.","english_translation":"The police officer ordered the car to pull over."},{"sentence":"Encostei o carro para atender o telefone.","translation":"I pulled the car over to answer the phone.","english_translation":"I pulled the car over to answer the phone."}],"collocations":["encostar o carro (pull over the car)","encostar na estrada (pull over on the road)"],"synonyms":["parar","estacionar","aproximar"],"antonyms":["afastar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(比喩的に)頼る、依存する、頼みにする","english_definition":"(figuratively) to rely on, to depend on","examples":[{"sentence":"Ele sempre encosta nos amigos para resolver seus problemas.","translation":"He always relies on his friends to solve his problems.","english_translation":"He always relies on his friends to solve his problems."}],"collocations":["encostar nos amigos (rely on friends)","encostar na família (rely on family)"],"synonyms":["depender","contar com","confiar em"],"antonyms":["desprezar","ignorar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(軍事)追い詰める、包囲する","english_definition":"(military) to corner, to surround","examples":[{"sentence":"As tropas encostaram o inimigo na montanha.","translation":"The troops cornered the enemy in the mountains.","english_translation":"The troops cornered the enemy in the mountains."}],"collocations":["encostar o inimigo (corner the enemy)"],"synonyms":["cercar","acorralar","envolver"],"antonyms":["libertar","soltar"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From Portuguese 'encostar', derived from 'costa' (coast, side, rib) + 'en-' (prefix indicating placement or action) + '-ar' (verb suffix). Literally, 'to put against the side'.","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ẽ.kuʃˈtaɾ/","notes":"Pronunciation can vary slightly depending on the region. The 'e' at the beginning is often nasalized."}, "inflection":{"verb_forms":{"infinitive":"encostar","gerund":"encostando","past_participle":"encostado","present_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"encosto","2nd_person_singular":"encostas","3rd_person_singular":"encosta","1st_person_plural":"encostamos","2nd_person_plural":"encostais","3rd_person_plural":"encostam"},"preterite_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"encostei","2nd_person_singular":"encostaste","3rd_person_singular":"encostou","1st_person_plural":"encostámos","2nd_person_plural":"encostastes","3rd_person_plural":"encostaram"},"future_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"encostarei","2nd_person_singular":"encostarás","3rd_person_singular":"encostará","1st_person_plural":"encostaremos","2nd_person_plural":"encostareis","3rd_person_plural":"encostarão"}}},"notes":"This is a regular -ar verb in Portuguese."}, "usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Encostar' is a versatile verb with meanings ranging from physical actions like leaning or pulling over to figurative senses of relying on someone. The precise meaning depends heavily on the context. When used with vehicles, it typically means to pull over to the side of the road.","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Eu encosto na paraede.","correct":"Eu encosto-me na parede.","note":"When referring to oneself leaning, the reflexive pronoun 'me' is often needed, especially in European Portuguese."}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["encosto (noun: backrest, support, leaning)","encostado (adjective: leaning, supported)"],"related_terms":["costa (noun: coast, side, rib)"]},"level_frequency":{"level":"B1","notes":"A common verb, likely encountered at intermediate levels of Portuguese learning."},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Encostar' is a fairly common verb with several meanings. It can mean to lean something against something else, or for a person to lean against something. It can also mean to pull a vehicle over to the side of the road. Figuratively, it can mean to rely on someone. Pay attention to the context to understand the specific meaning."}, "example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Por favor, encoste a mesa na janela.","translation":"Please lean the table against the window.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"lean"},{"sentence":"Ele se encostou na árvore para descansar.","translation":"He leaned against the tree to rest.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"rest"},{"sentence":"O motorista encostou o carro na berma.","translation":"The driver pulled the car over to the shoulder.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"pull over"},{"sentence":"Não encoste em mim!","translation":"Don't lean on me! / Don't rely on me!","type":"verb","meaning_category":"rely on"}]}
